nodes.text: A clone trooper captain accompanied Representative Jar Jar Binks and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi on a diplomatic mission during the Clone Wars.

Following the diplomatic negotiations, the clone trooper captain accompanied Kenobi and Binks back to Coruscant. En route, their ship was attacked by a Confederate squadron, and they crash-landed on the ice planet of Hoth. The captain was killed in the ensuing skirmish.
